parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To carry, bear, bring; I conduct, lead; perhaps: I make publicly known. A primary verb.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Fattened, fatted. From a derivative of sitos; grain-fed, i.e. Fattened.
A calf, heifer, young bull. Probably strengthened for oschos; a young bullock.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; properly, to rush, i.e. to sacrifice; by extension to immolate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From eu and phren; to put in a good frame of mind, i.e. Rejoice.
